item.title: Privacy
item.description: Privacy statement # Traffic on this website is tracked by the creator using Google Analytics; out of curiosity of which spices people click on more, and from what countries visitors are from.

item.title: Terms
item.description: Terms & conditions # The website and the database are still under development, please use with a grain of salt.
